ComicInfo.Summary:
"Witches-n-Kittens" Part 2 of 2 Story and Art By Jim Balent This issue concludes the story arc of "Witches-n-Kittens" Tarot and the 3 Kittens battle Latex Red and her troop of Satanic School Girls of Doom for the custody of prisoner Saddam Hussein. It's Witches of Mass destruction for Salem this Halloween!
